/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling leisurely along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise serene setting. A solitary car is parked on the side of the road, its presence subtly blending with the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the verdant greenery below. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and dimension to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue of the sky and the gray of the road. The image is a beautiful representation of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the essence of the city in a single frame.
